attributes.action: Increase income tax for those earning more than £150,000 pa
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned support the premise that those earning above £150,000 pa are not paying a fair amount of tax in comparison to the majority of tax payers.

We therefore support the idea that taxation should be more equitable and wish to see the taxation for this group increase to 60% until such time as Britain has paid off its debts and is back in surplus.
